richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Blankets for T.O. hosted two events for October 2020!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We started off the Fall semester by organizing an open giveaway for a $20 Amazon gift card and Blankets for T.O. membership. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In the spirit of Halloween, we hosted a pumpkin carving competition open to all UTSC students! It was also a good time to destress from midterm exams, since students were able to socialize and have a good time while competing to carve the best jack-o'-lantern they could. The pumpkins carved were awesome! Thanks to all those who participated! ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4gdgK5u7XQ0cD2DivvUMgy","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: In October, Blankets for T.O. hosted a pumpkin carving contest for UTSC students and giveaway.
